projects.title: TECHVISTA
projects.description: This project showcases mastery in responsive React UI design, offering a single-page app with seamless navigation, tabbed layouts, and captivating carousels. Through innovative tech and design fusion, it delivers a contemporary, device-agnostic experience.

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: Powered by Chakra UI, this dynamic React app offers seamless theme switching, video player/upload, and secure authentication. Fully responsive, it ensures an immersive experience on laptops, mobiles, and iPads.

projects.title: XCrypto
projects.description: XCrypto is a dynamic project leveraging Axios to fetch data using real-time API illustrating Bitcoin exchange rates in USD, INR, and Euro.It displays dynamically fetched static Bitcoin information, ensuring complete responsiveness across all devices.

projects.title: REACT CART
projects.description: Built with Redux Toolkit for state management, this project features product listings with add-to-cart and delete functionalities. It performs real-time calculations for items added or removed from the cart and is completely responsive.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: This digital portfolio showcases all projects with full animation and a beautiful carousel. Data entered is seamlessly sent to Firebase, ensuring complete responsiveness across devices.
